org.intermine.bio.dataconversion

Class UniprotFilterTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • org.intermine.bio.dataconversion.UniprotFilterTask

  • public class UniprotFilterTask
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task
    Read a set of Uniprot XML files and write out only those elements for an organism in the given set of names.
